message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $11,500 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This reflects its value to me while still allowing you a reasonable profit. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,500 is a bit below my minimum. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This leaves room for both of us to walk away happy.  What do you think?
